meanings: (배·비행기 등의) crewman, crew member; (비행기의) flight attendant[crew], cabin attendant[crew]; (남자) steward; (여자) stewardess; (집합적) (the) crew

vlive.korean: [얼음물 챙겨주시는 친절한 승무원] - 물에 얼음도 드릴까요? - 뭐든 상관없습니다. Would you like ice in the water? - Whatever is okay. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.13
vlive.english: Would you like ice in the water? - Whatever is okay.

vlive.korean: [황민현 기장님 역사상 난기류 따위 없어] 승무원 그 기장님! [There's no such thing as turbulence in pilot Minhyun's book] Like pilot's in planes! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 예~예~예~ 들썩들썩 하트 어깨춤으로 함.께.춤.춰.🎶💕 (NU’EST’s new fan chant!)
vlive.english: [There's no such thing as turbulence in pilot Minhyun's book] Like pilot's in planes!

vlive.korean: 남자 승무원? Male flight attendant? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 심야동방🌛
[서연주] 제가 승무원이라서... [Seo Yeon Ju] I'm a flight attendant. 듣기 View video 방판소년단-SBS Plus : [방판소년단 EP56] 연남동 (똘)끼남을 아시나요?
vlive.english: [Seo Yeon Ju] I'm a flight attendant.

vlive.korean: 그 열몇 시간 비행하는데 승무원님께서 참 이게... During the whole trip of 10 hours on the plane, ... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 😇🐯🐶💎💕
vlive.english: During the whole trip of 10 hours on the plane, ...

examples.korean: I crewed for him on his yacht last summer. 발음듣기 나는 지난 여름에 그의 요트에서 승무원으로 일해 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I crewed for him on his yacht last summer. 발음

examples.korean: the officers and crew 발음듣기 장교들과 일반 사병들[계급을 불문한 전 승무원] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Rescuers made heroic efforts to save the crew. 발음듣기 구조대원들은 그 승무원들을 구하기 위해 영웅적인 노력을 기울였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rescuers made heroic efforts to save the crew. 발음

examples.korean: None of the passengers and crew were injured. 발음듣기 승객과 승무원은 아무도 다치지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: None of the passengers and crew were injured. 발음

examples.korean: The ship’s crew was sluicing down the deck. 발음듣기 배의 승무원들이 갑판을 씻어 내리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship’s crew was sluicing down the deck. 발음
